title: Ponds: an introduction
creator_credit: Donald Walton, Anvil Films and Record Group and Seabourne Enterprises
brief_description: Explains the yearly cycle of pond life, the dependence on warmth and light for growth and the interchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide. The pond returns to rest period when days shorten and the water becomes cold and minerals are replenished from decaying plants and animals in readiness for the circle to begin again.
